subtitle: Hello everyone, this is Gene, I'm happy to announce that I've completely simplified my Patreon into
just one membership option of $3 this membership gives you exclusive access
to my private Astral Doorway Ciscord community so this is an invitation to the many of you
lovely people who have sent me kind and loving messages of thanks and support and would now
like to join me a bit more intimately, but let's get one thing straight I'm already a financially
independent person as a high school teacher in my day job - spirituality is not
and never will be a business for me i'll get more into that later and why I'm making a private group
so in the group and Patreon I'll be posting random thoughts pieces of wisdom that usually come to
me spontaneously throughout my day, I usually write these things into my phone to remember
and live by and maybe even include in my books, but now i can post them directly to this group
if you decide to join, you don't need to join the Discord server as i post content to the Patreon
page too and interact there, however Discord is a very intimate and fun way for a group like this to
come together, discuss, help each other, learn and share information and much more, if you don't know
how Discord works it's very simple i'll put some easy instructions in the description below
so here are some benefits that you'll receive from becoming a member - you'll essentially become a
student of a study group which consists of only fellow Astral Doorway Patrons, this sort of study
group allows me to converse with serious students who share the same value as me in spirituality
in turn it helps me formulate better future videos and books more efficiently by bouncing
ideas off you, we can engage in authentic and interesting discussions, study sessions
monthly live Q&As with me and voice chat, I'll also be doing live guided meditations and
I can even help you to interpret your dreams or astral projection experiences and so much more
the topics in the group are about life and the soul in general right? not just about astral projection
because as you know, if you've read my book, astral projection is synonymous with all things spiritual
it is a core part of our growth towards awakening, subjects that can be discussed in the group can
be things like clairvoyance, shamanism, religion buddhism, christianity, gnosticism, connecting
with the nature, prayer, meditation, destroying the ego, even building businesses, manifestation
transmutation, alchemy, science, physics, career, the zodiac, tarot cards, love and relationships
... you know - how to cope with being a spiritual person in a world amongst materialistic people
and much much more ~ I'm interested in life itself and if you are too, then you'll be good enough to join
you'll also receive episodes early on Tuesdays instead of Saturdays and be the first to
listen, comment and discuss the topics explored in them and be the first to ask me questions on the
youtube video so I don't need to rummage through all the comments before finding yours... you'll also
be the first to hear about my upcoming books and even help me contribute to them - if you do i'll
be more than happy to include your name in the acknowledgements page once the books are published
now bear with me i know not everyone wants to pay money especially for spiritual things which
i completely agree with - i'm totally against those master courses and coaching services which cost
hundreds if not thousands of dollars sometimes it's a ridiculous price to pay for something
that is accessible to everyone from within; it's everyone's birthright to this knowledge
and limiting it only to people that can afford it is frankly a universal crime, assuming that
the content within the course is genuine, hence why you'll never see me charge any sort of extortion
amount of money for any type of knowledge as you can also see from the price of my book, i'd rather
face death knowing i helped people with a clean conscience than excessively profiting of spiritual
wisdom, i wish more spiritual teachers would have the courage and authenticity to practice this
especially in this modern day, i'll tell you now i can name so many so-called spiritual youtubers
teachers and gurus who are charging like $1000 for a course or coaching service
i mean what are they doing? and this is even more appalling for me because when i watch those people
i can tell and see that most of them are not awakened at all, they're just as regular as you
now i'm not saying i'm any better than them but what i'm saying is they're charging around $1000
as if they're the next Jesus right? and that it's going to make you the next Jesus or something
you would learn so much more from spending $5 on the hundreds of old books
from spiritual masters, and you know a lot of those masters held classes too but they never
charged anything for their services and they only lived off donations or the small amounts
they made from their books, they weren't interested in branding themselves, commercializing themselves
coming across so fake, seducing people with nice thumbnails and all that other crap
you know buy books from authentic teachers such as Eckhart Tolle, Jurgen Ziewe
Gurdjieff, Krishnamurti, Swami Vivekananda, Helena Blavatsky, Lobsang Rampa, Samael Aun Weor
the many Dalai Lamas who lived throughout time, Lao Tzu, Hermes Trismegistus, there are so
many and as many of them say, I believe Jesus even said it: "Do not follow me"... Samael said; "I do not
follow anyone, nor do i want anyone to follow me. What I want is for each one of you to follow his
own Self"... and Swami Vivekananda said; "You have to grow from the inside out. None can teach you, none
can make you spiritual. There is no other teacher but your own soul"... so the point is to look within
not spend hundreds on spiritual courses, and let me tell you writing a book is far more effort
than most of these online courses, it takes months and even years of dedicated hard work to write a
book which will only cost 3 to 10 dollars and I can find many spiritual courses which cost
hundreds just for a set of 20 videos which consist of around 10-minute videos - you get my point
for what purpose do these people place such a high value on their courses? material abundance? well
let me tell you abundance is absolutely relative and subjective to the individual
forget the idea of abundance, so many people are obsessed with this idea, stop following the crowd
and even if they think it's for spiritual reasons, most of the time they do it for that end goal of
material manifestation, realize profoundly that you will die, your life is short and temporary
do you want to waste it thinking about how you can become rich and famous? manifestation is a
miniscule part of spirituality, there is such a thing as real 'spiritual spirituality' instead of
'material spirituality' it is the spirituality of the spirit - not of the material, as it says in the
Bible and what Bob Marley used in one of his songs; "Don't gain the world and lose your soul,
wisdom is better than silver or gold"... now don't get me wrong, if you ask me for advice about
manifestation and attracting what you desire, i'll help you and tell you what you need to know, it is
a real thing, but what i'm saying is to receive abundance you don't need to focus on the idea
of abundance, you need to focus on realizing and transcending yourself and your own ego - your own
shadow and darkness like i've been speaking about so much on this channel
those are the things that are in your way of you receiving abundance and realizing your
full potential - the spiritual path and awakening is absolutely personal, hence why we need that
inner connection with our own inner guidance, so stop idolizing these fake spiritual youtubers and
don't do the same with me either, you need to find your own inner path, your own inner master, your own
inner God and talk with it within the silence of your innermost being... you have a wealth of treasure
inside you yet you're spending hundreds on courses thinking it's going to magically help you because
of the illusion of the material value placed on it, but this value we place on things works right?
we need to value teachers and teachings because then we understand things from our hearts
rather than our egos and this is one of the main reasons why I'm creating this private group
through the filter of a small payment, so that instead of a public group of just any skeptics
and people who don't value what i have to share, i can gather a group of people who share the same
value and have a genuine interest and want to learn $3 is cheaper than a cup of
coffee but still this will do its job of avoiding people who aren't truly ready to contemplate and
practice spiritual knowledge in a more serious way, hence this results in a more mature, devoted,
peaceful, and honorable community, so by becoming a patreon you'll be able to attend the live voice
chat Q&As which I schedule with the group at minimum once a month as well as me being heavily
involved in the text channels, these Q&A events can also involve discussions, hearing about your
path and astral projection stories and getting help with them and just discussing all things
spiritual, as the community grows i'll surely be joining into live voice chats at anytime at my own
leisure doing guided meditations and other random events such as ones related to my upcoming books
and videos, the early access and ad-free videos will be available in the Discord server or if you
just want to support the channel and don't want to join the Discord it will also be available in
Patreon too so it's Tuesday today I've published a video for members already which is available
for you to watch now if you join, so yeah I'm also doing this not just for you but for myself as well
because it's enjoyable and fruitful to have a small group of people related to spirituality
because such a group, as you know, is hard to find in the physical world and we lack the right people
to express our spiritual interests to in a safe and private environment and it's nice for
it not to be public so that there aren't trolls, argumentative skeptics, religious fanatics, that i
know all too well are abundance on the internet, i know this even more so because i moderate the
200'000 member astral projection reddit group and also the Discord for that as well, so this private
Astral Doorway group is a way for me to express myself more clearly and directly for serious
students only - serious does not mean you need to be an astral projector or advanced in spirituality
you can be a complete beginner - what matters is that you have a genuine interest and want
to learn and grow spiritually, the intention of a group is to fill ourselves with spiritual learning
and meaning not with controversy, entertainment or trivia right? you see on youtube and reddit and
anywhere i'm in the public eye my mind is making far more extra effort to be extremely careful
of false judgments, false interpretations, possible skeptical counter arguments and to be considerate
of everyone's viewpoints, i do not do this out of fear because I, as a thoughtful teacher, understand
the fears, confusions and questions that pop-up in the minds of people and general collective
consciousness, because i've been there right? but with a group of genuinely interested people who
value my work, i can communicate and express myself in a more intimate and soulful way, so to speak
teaching and sharing my knowledge and wisdom is my greatest passion in life but too often it becomes
a challenge in having to defend myself, correct myself, clarify myself, in extreme ways to all sorts
of people out there, now i don't mind doing that of course, in fact, it's helped me to become a better
teacher overall, however i also want to be able to just talk casually and openly to my fellow friends,
brothers and sisters in life who are walking on the path and are actually serious about awakening,
astral projection and general life and afterlife topics... outside of my youtube when i go to help
people in online communities i often feel like i'm wasting my time and for a while i felt the
call to stop investing so much of that time trying to help people who don't truly value the things i
have to offer, i mean how can any learning happen when you're being insulted or accused of being a
prophet or something? you know i don't mind the insults and gaslighting i have a backbone
of course but it's really not the point and not the intention of me just simply innocently
answering questions and just trying to help people, so if you have access to the internet, you have a
phone, you've bought books, then you'll be able to spare $3, and this three dollars is not
just a payment to support me and show me some love and encouragement but it's also symbolic of your
seriousness, gratitude and respect for what i have to share, and that feeling is completely
returned in favor from me as well - so if you want to join this community of like-minded individuals
in a private and respectful group who are all interested in becoming more spiritually aware
and more conscious in our lives, then just follow the link in the description which is
patreon.com/astraldoorway thank you and I'll see you there!
